name: 阿万·贾马尔
introduction: Avan is a motivated and committed actress with strong stage instincts and extensive formal training. She is an ardent proponent of Stanislavski's "Method" system of acting. Having been raised in her homeland Kurdistan/Iraq and is currently living in the UK, she has had first-hand experience in seeing the movie world and cinemas since childhood. She has appeared as lead roles in suspenseful movies that brought out the best in her. The Exam was a critical success for Avan and the highlight of the actress's career was the warm critical welcome at Karlovy Vary film festival in Czech Republic.
